message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial ask. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $18,500?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $18,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $17,000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
